name: reviews_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yummly.
Tool description: API to query data about recipe, plan, ingredients, etc... as on official site
API description: Fetches a list of reviews and feedback from users using the Yummly API.

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set.

globalid.description: The value of the globalId field returned in the feeds/list and feeds/search API.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return.
